I sent it to Nikon, since it was still under warranty, and they claim warranty was voided because it had some very minor dents, and the a fall caused the problem. They charged me $100 to get it fixed, when a new one costs much less than that! Never again will I purchase a Nikon product.

Reviews.Title: Not a fan.
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong, the camera is super cute. My iphone 4s takes way better pictures though. Don't buy this, its not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Good camera - Bad compatibility!
Reviews.Author: MrBankz
Reviews.Content: This camera does NOT work with the AutoPlay feature of my computer.  When connecting this camera to my Toshiba Laptop PC (running Windows 7) using a USB cable, the PC AutoPlay function does not recognize it.  I have spoken to Tech Support at both Toshiba and Nikon and no one can correct this problem.  It appears that this model Nikon camera is not compatible with some Toshiba laptops.  This is one of the few models of Nikon cameras that have never had a firmware upgrade, plus the driver is dated 2006, which is older than my Toshiba PC.  Since I can still download photos to my PC manually using the Nikon photo application, I decided to keep the camera.

Reviews.Title: Pésima calidad de la cámara; excelente respuesta de Amazon
Reviews.Author: Francisco Marquez
Reviews.Content: Compré esta cámara en noviembre del 2011, tres días después de recibida el lente se trabo, la apagué pensando que al encenderla funcionaría nuevamente, y nada. Solicité la devolución de mi dinero y Amazon tuvo una respuesta excelente. Mal por Nikon que ahora con tal de ahorrar dinero en producción de productos realiza trabajos defectuosos. Me decepciona la marca porque yo era un consumidor al tanto de sus productos, ahora lo pensaré dos veces.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Alison
Reviews.Content: When it came, it wasn't broken or harmed in any way. It works perfectly and the color is perfect. Nothing is wrong with this camera

Reviews.Title: good bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: G.Nalezynski Jr.
Reviews.Content: good product for the price. battery last longer then expected before needing a charge.no more batteries to buy.easy features for kids to use.

Reviews.Title: Returning it.
Reviews.Author: KM
Reviews.Content: I broke our Canon a few months ago when I dropped it on our tile floor.  So, we are in the market for a new camera and we've been agonizing over all the choices out there.  We want something durable, reliable, easy to use, without paying a lot, to take pictures of our 4 young kids.  I heard that Nikon made good cameras, which I am sure they do.  Just wasn't impressed with this one.  You get what you pay for, I guess.  I tried over and over to get pictures in focus.  None of the pics of my kids were in focus - of course, they are always moving.  So, I tried different settings and took pics of non-moving objects.  Still, most pictures were out of focus.  Frustrating.  Returning it asap.  I think we're going to have to spend a little more for the features we want.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: breddymusic
Reviews.Content: this camera is very versatile, very good image is one of the best cameras I've seen in the market, quality and cost make it easy to reach very good camera ... I recommend them

Reviews.Title: Good for what you spend
Reviews.Author: CRiley10
Reviews.Content: Ivory is because my iPhone and iPad pictures did not have the pixels I wanted. But I wanted to find something with good ratings and small and simple. My complaints are the same has most others, a lot of the pictures come out blurry, even on sports settings. However when I do get it not blurry pictures are good. I would suggest, if you can do spend a little more on a different camera. This will work good for us for now though.Conclusion. Good for simple still pictures. Not great for action and professional pictures.

Reviews.Title: A PIECE OF JUNK
Reviews.Author: T. L. Stickle
Reviews.Content: BLURRY-BLURRY-BLURRY!!!WARNING: BELIEVE ALL THE OTHER NEGATIVE REVIEWS about the Nikon Coolpix S3100! After six years of hard use, my Canon Powershot finally died and -like a fool - I decided to go with something cheap and BOY! did I ever learn the truth behind that expression, "You get what you pay for." Like other reviews mention, MAYBE one or twoshots out of every seven to ten taken are actually in FOCUS. I've never come across a digital still camera so completely useless in terms of its "point-and-shoot" (lack of)functionality. After having tried to use this camera for the last five months I realize that getting clear sharp images with it is an exercise in futility. This camera is a piece of junk and sadly lacks any quality whatsoever. Time to buy another Canon!

Reviews.Title: Light and Nice
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: The best point and shoot alternative.It's affordable, nice zoom, nice colors.Fits in any pocket... you'll love it.Of course it's not the best Nikon I have, but for this price you can not get any better.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: when it came time to use the camera it wouldn't come on no life at all very disapointed am returning the camera

Reviews.Title: Great price nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Joshua Foote
Reviews.Content: The camera isnt perfect so I cannot give five stars but for the price the camera does a good job.  It is fairly grainy in low light settings but that is to be expected without a tripod and a iso setting for low light.  Other than that its very small and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: waste
Reviews.Author: Myrna Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I'm really disappointed by the picture quality. Took me forever to get a good night shot. Pictures came out blurry...I wish I would've done some more research before purchasing this camera. A few extra bucks and a lil more time would've got me the camera of my dreams. I don't highly recommend this camera, focus is awful and its so hard to take night shots! takes good pics during the day other than that noo good.....

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I expect it
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: The design is very sexy and fuctions are all there and great. But the picture quality is not what I expect from Nikon. Maybe I expect a little too much.However, I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Little camera
Reviews.Author: ndallguy "Blake"
Reviews.Content: This will fit in your pocket and has more recording time and you really don't have to adjust anything. It knows if it's dark it's just a great point and shoot. Worth every penny for a 14 mp. I fot it for a little over a $100 bucks!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: TPD
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, works awesome, and easy to use and carry with you! very easy features to use! definitely recommend to buy!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: PEPI
Reviews.Content: I'M SO HAPPY WITH MY NEW CAMERA, ITS SO BEAUTIFUL, TAKE THE PHOTOS SO AMAZING, CLARITY, NITIDO... I RECOMMENDED FOR EVERYONE

Reviews.Title: Lens Error?
Reviews.Author: Kamlesh Desai "Kamlesh"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from a prominent retailer Croma, on 14th, and today- 21st, I have had to return it to the store for 'repairs.' The lens would open half way, and the motor then kept 'jumping' and refused to fully extend the lens to start up the picture taking.Its so frustrating that in India, the store gave me a '4 day ' return, but on Day 7,  it has reached Nikon Service Center.In the first week, I must say the camera has taken amazing pictures for its size, and its a very very good daylight performer. Clear and Crisp.But whats the point. Other web sites say its the cheap gear drive that engages and 'pushes' out the lens when the camera starts up that slips.The one star is for now having ZERO confidence in the camera.I love Amazon sitting in India for this very reason. I would have sent it back, and probably gone in for a Canon A 3200.

Reviews.Title: Even for a cheap camera - performance is miserable
Reviews.Author: Abekin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera looking for a portable point and shoot to take to family get togethers, camping and canoe trips and other places where my DSLR would be too bulky. I wasn't expecting amazing photos, but I was expecting passable quality. My girlfriend had just recently purchased a Canon point and shoot for the same purpose and her camera performed admirably, focusing quite quickly and even performing somewhat decently indoors.We'll start with the few good points. For such a cheap camera it seems reasonably well built and looks quite stylish. The bright blue case makes it hard to forget. The LCD screen in back is bright and works quite well. Controls are reasonably simple (but don't expect much in the way of manual control.)Now for the cons. This camera just doesn't perform well at all. Almost all photos with this camera come out blurry, it doesn't matter if it's a landscape, a person posing, or an inanimate object. Even high shutter speeds (1/200 or more), no zoom and low ISO will not alleviate this. It's just a fact of life with this camera that your photos will look grainy, fuzzy and you will never get sharp focus.The camera is also slow. It takes a long time to find "focus" but as mentioned above it's still blurry. There's a delay between depressing the shutter button and camera taking a photo. There's a long lag between taking photos. Deleting photos also takes a long time. Changing scenes can be a bit of pain since it requires using digital menus and doesn't seem to have any meaningful affect on pictures to boot. The macro mode is utter crap and I can't even take pictures of yarn with a tripod and excellent lighting without image blur.I vastly prefer my 5 year old Powershot A95 to this camera. I'd say stay away from it unless you enjoy blurry, softly focused images. For only $30-40 more you can easily get yourself a much, much better camera.

Reviews.Title: THIS CAMERA IS GREAT U SHOULD BUY IT RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: R0Y F
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS SOOOOOOO COOL IT TAKES GREAT PICS AND IF U HAVE SHAKEY HANDS LIKE I DO IT DONT MATTER CUZ THIS CAMERA IS SOO BA LOVE THIS THING HOPE TO HAVE IT FOR A LONG TIME.

Reviews.Title: Horrible focus
Reviews.Author: hcrm
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and I am completely shocked by how poor the focus is.  Barely any of the photos I take are in focus and nothing I do seems to correct the problem.  Completely unacceptable.  I wish I had paid more attention to the negative reviews on here because they are correct.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy.
Reviews.Author: Lilly Chase
Reviews.Content: The camera was small, as expected, but felt flimsy and with the amount of pictures I expected to take with it, I felt it wasn't worth keeping.

Reviews.Title: Far to slow between pictures
Reviews.Author: Philip E. Scherry
Reviews.Content: It took 5 seconds between pictures.  Totally unacceptable when taking pictures of kids.  I am immediately returning this, and looking for something that has onboard memory.The 2year old Kodak we are replacing was able to take 3 pictures before having to sit and process.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it...
Reviews.Author: EKEA
Reviews.Content: I really wish that I would have paid closer attention to the other reviews. I took this camera on my vacation to celebrate my graduation from college. I waited all year long for this trip to Central America with my family. While the picture quality is average, it moved way too slow between pictures and it froze very often. During our vacation, I was trying to take quick action shots of my daughter or mom, but the camera just wouldn't allow it. Because it moved slowly, I was not able to take good shots of concerts and plays that we saw. Even when you turned the camera on it takes a very long time to warm up to take a picture. After a frustrating week with the camera, I get home only to have problems uploading the pictures to my computer. I'm still not able to upload them. I thought maybe it was the memory card so I tried another one and it didn't work either. When I took the memory card to Target to print them out, many of them didn't save correctly and you can see the picture. I'm not very picky when it comes to a simple point and shoot camera. I just want something reliable and simple. But this camera is not worth it. Of course I got it from Walmart, and I can't find the recipe.

Reviews.Title: Great Product as promised
Reviews.Author: Kevin Short "Kevin J Short"
Reviews.Content: This camera came as promised, shipped well packaged, performed as promised and has taken many pictures already posted on my Facebook page.  I highly recommend this product from this shipper!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix Camera was a big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Coopix Camera for my daughter for Christmas. She took one picture to try it out and turned it off.When she went to use it again the camera lens was stuck and wouldn't open.Now the camera is useless and I cannot return or exchange it, and now have to send it back to nikkon and pay for shipping and wait.We are very disappointed with this product and also with nikkons customer service. This is the first item I purchased on Amazon and I don't know how to even contact the seller

Reviews.Title: It's the clarity, stupid!
Reviews.Author: J. Hill
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot going for it.  It fails only at what it was intended to do: take clear digital images.  I took this lightweight, pocket-size camera on a trip out West and left my big old Canon back home.  I'm really sorry I did!  No matter how I programmed the camera, all of the images are blurry.  Also, the main menu software failed, so I couldn't change the date and time settings.  This has taught me to read the negative reviews first - I would never have bought this camera if I had.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera ~ BUT ...
Reviews.Author: Margaret Larmore
Reviews.Content: My 7 year old Coolpix 4200 is much easier to use. I like the new one but wish it had a viewfinder for bright light outside. The old one had one, so I didn't realize this one didn't until I received it. Bought it for a big trip to Europe this summer, so I hope I won't be disappointed when I start using it big time for once in a lifetime photos.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S3100 (Blue)
Reviews.Author: South District "DelDOT S/D"
Reviews.Content: All of the employees are very satisfied with this camera; some have even gone out and bought one for their personal use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX without memory card
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Christine W. Roby
Reviews.Content: This camera has features we wanted at a good price and was delivered promptly.  The problem was THAT THE SITE DID NOT MAKE CLEAR THAT THE CAMERA WOULD ARRIVE WITHOUT ANY MEMORY CARD.  This was annoying because we did not realize it until we went to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: This camera is terrible!!!
Reviews.Author: Paul Isao Ferris
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera exclusively for 3 different occasions.This camera is terrible. I was taking pictures at a concert last nightwith every different variation of the autofocus/no autofocus, zoom/no autozoom, etcto find the perfect combo. Took about 30 pictures and got them developed today..EXACTLY 3 came out that were NOT blurry. This camera is a complete wasteif you're not a statue taking pics in perfect conditions without the subject moving!Save your money and get a $30 camera instead of this thing. Complete waste of $$$

Reviews.Title: xmas 11
Reviews.Author: swnvb
Reviews.Content: Shipped UPS which left it at front door. Arrived  complete and well packaged. Not sure of function as it is a gift.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Camera
Reviews.Author: Anderson
Reviews.Content: Excelente cámara. Muy buena relación precio valor! Obviamente existen versiones superiores pero es una perfecta cámara de bolsillo! Extremadamente pequeña y manejable y con muy buen performance. La mejor disponible en un precio tan accesible.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX is indeed cool!
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: After lot of web searches, I decided to go for this model. It turned out to be a good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Fowler
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera today and so far I love it! I rated it as a 4 because I thought that the color (pink) would be a lighter shade. This is a great little camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: A.Mills
Reviews.Content: Very nice and stylish camera just thought it would be a little more durable maybe metal, not thin aluminum, but i do recommend it

Reviews.Title: JW KREIDER
Reviews.Author: JW KREIDER
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS CAMERA A WEEK AGO.  THE CAMERA DID NOT HAVE A MEMORY CARD IN IT.  I HAD TO GO TO BEST BUY TO SEE WHAT TYPE MEMORY CARD IT HELD.  I WILL NEVER BUY ANY ELECTRONICS FROM AMAZON AGAIN, IF THE PRODUCT IS NOT COMPLETE YOU HAVE TO TO A BRICK AND MORTAR PLACE SO IT CAN BE USED.  I CALLED NIKON TO COMPLAIN, BUT THE "TECH" THOUGHT I WAS TALKING ABOUT GIGABYTES, BUT I WANTED TO KNOW WHICH TYPE OF MEMORY CARD IT TOOK.  BEST BUY SHOWED ME IT WAS THE SD/MMC CARD AND WENT FROM 2 GIGS UP TO 64 GIGS.  SHOP WHERE YOU YOU CAN DEAL WITH A PERSON AND GET THE EQUIPMENT FOR YOUR CAMERAS.  THE GUY AT BEST BUY GAVE ME A DISCOUN ON THE SUNDISC MEMORY CARD, AND TOLD ME HE WOULD CALL NIKON AND TELL THE "TECHS" TO ASK THE TYPE OF MEMORY CARD NOT THE SIZE.
